sentences.en: As his political stature has shrunk, he has grown correspondingly more dependent on the army.
sentences.cn: 随着政治声望的降低，他变得更加依赖军队了。

sentences.en: As the modern Olympics grew in stature, so too did athletics.
sentences.cn: 随着现代奥林匹克运动会声名远扬，田径运动也越来越受关注。

sentences.en: Bernard was short in stature, with a large head.
He grew in stature (= became more admired or popular ) during the campaign.
sentences.cn: 在这场宣传活动中，他的声望提高了。

sentences.en: He has a powerful build , though short in stature.
He is five feet five inches in stature [ height ] .
He was lampooned for his short stature and political views.
sentences.cn: 他的矮小身材和政治观点使他成了受奚落的对象。

sentences.en: It's a team unrivalled in stature, expertise and credibility.
sentences.cn: 这个团队的名声、专业技能和信誉都是无可匹敌的。

sentences.en: It's more than his physical stature that makes him remarkable.
sentences.cn: 他的与众不同之处不光是他的身高。

sentences.en: Mother was of very small stature, barely five feet tall.
sentences.cn: 母亲身材矮小，只有5英尺高。

sentences.en: She was a little short in stature.
The dress models are tall of stature.
sentences.cn: 时装模特儿的身材都较高.

sentences.en: This club has grown in stature over the last 20 years.
sentences.cn: 这家俱乐部在过去20年间知名度大增。

sentences.en: Who can deny his stature as the world's greatest cellist?
sentences.cn: 谁能否认他是世界上最伟大的大提琴演奏家呢？

trans.tran_cn: （特指人的）身长，身材，声望，发展、成长的状况或高度
